text: The 2014–15 Håndboldligaen (known as the Boxer Herreligaen for sponsorship reasons) is the 79th season of the Håndboldligaen, Denmark's premier Handball league. == Team information == The following 14 clubs compete in the Håndboldligaen during the 2014–15 season: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Arena !
